org.antfarmer.ejce.hibernate

Class EncryptedObjectType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.hibernate.AbstractHibernateType
      • org.antfarmer.ejce.hibernate.EncryptedObjectType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterizedType, UserType

    public class EncryptedObjectType
extends AbstractHibernateType
    Hibernate UserType class which encrypts and decrypts Java objects transparently. This ensures data is stored in it's encrypted form in persistent storage, while not affecting it's real value in the application.
